name: Amber AI
long_description:
Amber is an extension of your post-sales team that has context on every customer and every action. 
- Transforms a sea of faceless customers into data-driven opportunities your team can execute on 
- Automate reactive responses to minimize firefighting 
- Supercharge proactive outreach with AI crafted conversations and up-sell qualification; every customer will feel taken care of 

Overtime Amber can learn and scale more and more of your post-sales motions.
